code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var userSlice=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:null,reducers:{addUser:function addUser(state,action){return action.payload;},removeUser:function removeUser(state,action){return null;}}});var _userSlice$actions=userSlice.actions,addUser=_userSlice$actions.addUser,removeUser=_userSlice$actions.removeUser;export{addUser,removeUser};export default userSlice.reducer;
